briefTitle: ENDEAVOUR: Phase 3 Multicenter Study of Revusiran (ALN-TTRSC) in Patients With Transthyretin (TTR) Mediated Familial Amyloidotic Cardiomyopathy (FAC)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Documented TTR mutation
* Amyloid deposits in cardiac or non-cardiac tissue
* Medical history of heart failure
* Evidence of cardiac involvement by echocardiogram

Exclusion Criteria:

* Has known primary amyloidosis (AL), leptomeningeal amyloidosis, non-FAC hereditary cardiomyopathy, hypertensive cardiomyopathy, or cardiomyopathy due to valvular heart disease
* Has known peripheral vascular disease affecting ambulation
* Has a Polyneuropathy Disability score \>2
* Has a New York Heart Association (NYHA) classification of IV

outcomeMeasures.title: 6 Minute Walk Distance (6-MWD)
outcomeMeasures.description: The difference between revusiran and placebo group in change from baseline to 18 months in the total distance walked in 6 minutes

outcomeMeasures.title: Serum TTR Levels
outcomeMeasures.description: The difference between revusiran (ALN-TTRSC) and placebo group in the percent reduction in serum TTR levels over 18 months

outcomeMeasures.title: Composite Cardiovascular (CV) Mortality and Cardiovascular (CV) Hospitalization
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of cardiovascular-related deaths and cardiovascular-related hospitalizations in the placebo group compared to the revusiran (ALN-TTRSC) treatment group

outcomeMeasures.title: New York Heart Association (NYHA) Class
outcomeMeasures.description: The difference between revusiran (ALN-TTRSC) and placebo group in the change from baseline to 18 months in the NYHA class

outcomeMeasures.title: Kansas City Cardiomyopathy Questionnaire (KCCQ)
outcomeMeasures.description: The difference between revusiran (ALN-TTRSC) and placebo group in the change from Baseline to 18 months in the Kansas City Cardiomyopathy Questionnaire

outcomeMeasures.title: Cardiovascular (CV) Mortality
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of cardiovascular-related deaths in the placebo group compared to the revusiran (ALN-TTRSC) treatment group

outcomeMeasures.title: Cardiovascular (CV) Hospitalization
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of cardiovascular-related hospitalizations in the placebo group compared to the revusiran (ALN-TTRSC) treatment group

outcomeMeasures.title: All-cause Mortality
outcomeMeasures.description: Total number of deaths in the placebo group compared to the revusiran (ALN-TTRSC) treatment group
